strModelFlags.name: IS_VAN
strModelFlags.description: Allows double doors for the rear doors animation.

strModelFlags.name: IS_BUS
strModelFlags.description: Uses bus animations for entry/exit.

strModelFlags.name: IS_LOW
strModelFlags.description: Uses animations suitable for cars with a low ride-height.

strModelFlags.name: IS_BIG
strModelFlags.description: Changes the way that the AI drives around corners.

strModelFlags.name: ABS_STD
strModelFlags.description: Arcade Anti-Lock Braking System (ABS) equipped as standard; minimal slip allowed.

strModelFlags.name: ABS_OPTION
strModelFlags.description: Arcade Anti-Lock Braking System (ABS) equipped w/ brakes upgrade.

strModelFlags.name: ABS_ALT_STD
strModelFlags.description: Realistic Anti-Lock Braking System (ABS) equipped as standard; some slip allowed.

strModelFlags.name: ABS_ALT_OPTION
strModelFlags.description: Realistic Anti-Lock Braking System (ABS) equipped w/brakes upgrade.

strModelFlags.name: NO_DOORS
strModelFlags.description: For vehicles that don't have any operable doors.

strModelFlags.name: TANDEM_SEATS
strModelFlags.description: Two people will use the front passenger seat.

strModelFlags.name: SIT_IN_BOAT
strModelFlags.description: Uses seated boat animation instead of standing.

strModelFlags.name: HAS_TRACKS
strModelFlags.description: For vehicles with tracks instead of tires.

strModelFlags.name: NO_EXHAUST
strModelFlags.description: Removes all exhaust particles.

strModelFlags.name: DOUBLE_EXHAUST
strModelFlags.description: Creates a second exhaust by mirroring the model's exhaust over the y-axis.

strModelFlags.name: NO1FPS_LOOK_BEHIND
strModelFlags.description: Prevents player using rear view when in first-person mode.

strModelFlags.name: CAN_ENTER_IF_NO_DOOR
strModelFlags.description: Allows entry into the vehicle despite no currently accessible doors.

strModelFlags.name: AXLE_F_TORSION
strModelFlags.description: Front wheels stay vertical to the car.

strModelFlags.name: AXLE_F_SOLID
strModelFlags.description: Front wheels stay parallel to each other.

strModelFlags.name: AXLE_F_MCPHERSON
strModelFlags.description: Front wheels can tilt.

strModelFlags.name: AXLE_R_TORSION
strModelFlags.description: Rear wheels stay vertical to the car.

strModelFlags.name: AXLE_R_SOLID
strModelFlags.description: Rear wheels stay parallel to each other.

strModelFlags.name: AXLE_R_MCPHERSON
strModelFlags.description: Rear wheels can tilt.

strModelFlags.name: DONT_FORCE_GRND_CLEARANCE
strModelFlags.description: Bumper bones can clip through objects/terrain that are normally too high.

strModelFlags.name: DONT_RENDER_STEER
strModelFlags.description: Does not render steering animations.

strModelFlags.name: NO_WHEEL_BURST
strModelFlags.description: Has Bulletproof Tires as standard.

strModelFlags.name: INDESTRUCTIBLE
strModelFlags.description: Can't explode or be considered inoperable from damage.

strModelFlags.name: DOUBLE_FRONT_WHEELS
strModelFlags.description: Places a second instance of each front wheel next to the normal one.

strModelFlags.name: RC
strModelFlags.description: For RC vehicles such as the RC Bandito and Invade & Persuade Tank.

strModelFlags.name: DOUBLE_RWHEELS
strModelFlags.description: Places a second instance of each rear wheel next to the normal one.

strModelFlags.name: MF_NO_WHEEL_BREAK
strModelFlags.description: Prevents wheel bones from detaching off the vehicle due to damage.

strModelFlags.name: IS_HATCHBACK
strModelFlags.description: Uses animations suitable for Trunk doors on hatchback-style vehicle bodies.

strHandlingFlags.name: SMOOTH_COMPRESN
strHandlingFlags.description: Simulates progressive spring suspension. Makes suspension compression motion smoother.

strHandlingFlags.name: REDUCED_MOD_MASS
strHandlingFlags.description: Reduces mass added from upgrades.

strHandlingFlags.name: _DISABLE_HORN
strHandlingFlags.description: Disables horn. Used on vehicles with KERS.

strHandlingFlags.name: OFFROAD_ABILITY3
strHandlingFlags.description: Inverts the way grip works on the vehicle; with this flag enabled, grip starts at the fTractionCurveMin value and may increase up to the fTractionCurveMax value upon wheel slip. Grip stays at max beyond the vehicle's peak slip angle.

strHandlingFlags.name: NO_HANDBRAKE
strHandlingFlags.description: Disables handbrake control for the vehicle.

strHandlingFlags.name: STEER_REARWHEELS
strHandlingFlags.description: Steers the rear wheels instead of the front.

strHandlingFlags.name: HB_REARWHEEL_STEER
strHandlingFlags.description: Handbrake control makes the rear wheels steer as well as the front.

strHandlingFlags.name: STEER_ALL_WHEELS
strHandlingFlags.description: Steers all wheels, similar to 4-wheel-steering systems found on real vehicles. The rear wheels will steer at the same lock angle as the front, as defined by fSteeringLock.

strHandlingFlags.name: FREEWHEEL_NO_GAS
strHandlingFlags.description: Disables engine-braking when no throttle is applied.

strHandlingFlags.name: NO_REVERSE
strHandlingFlags.description: Disables reversing for the vehicle.

strHandlingFlags.name: STEER_NO_WHEELS
strHandlingFlags.description: Disables steering on all wheels, used with tracked vehicles.

strHandlingFlags.name: CVT
strHandlingFlags.description: Gives the vehicle a fixed-ratio transmission with a gear ratio of 0.90, used for vehicles with nInitialDriveGears=1. If gears amount to more than 1, it will simply force the vehicle into top gear upon acceleration. Recommended for electric vehicles.

strHandlingFlags.name: LESS_SNOW_SINK
strHandlingFlags.description: Less grip loss from deep mud/snow, most notably in North Yankton.

strHandlingFlags.name: TYRES_CAN_CLI
strHandlingFlags.description: Tires are allowed to clip into the pavement when under enough pressure, effectiveness depends on tire sidewall. Generally makes the vehicle deal with uneven terrain better. Notes: this is the reason Offroad Tires improve performance on specific vehicles made by R*.

strHandlingFlags.name: OFFROAD_ABILITY
strHandlingFlags.description: Scaled version of 00800000; similar effects, least power.

strHandlingFlags.name: OFFROAD_ABILITY2
strHandlingFlags.description: Scaled version of 00800000; similar effects, less power.

strHandlingFlags.name: HF_TYRES_RAISE_SIDE_IMPACT_THRESHOLD
strHandlingFlags.description: Includes the tires in the general side collision hitbox of the vehicle. Recommended for vehicles whose wheels extend beyond the bodywork, like monster-trucks.

strHandlingFlags.name: INCREASED_GRAVITY
strHandlingFlags.description: Includes bush-collision immunity, flat grip increase proportional to slip angle/lateral velocity, increased vehicle gravity.

strHandlingFlags.name: ENABLE_LEAN
strHandlingFlags.description: ??? Notes: Possibly for motorcycle leaning or boat leaning.

strHandlingFlags.name: _ALLOW_MOTORCYCLE_TRACTION_LOSS
strHandlingFlags.description: Allows motorcycles to lose traction.

strAdvancedFlags.name: _TRACTION_CONTROL
strAdvancedFlags.description: Earlier upshifts, hard rev-limit per gear, low-speed traction control.

strAdvancedFlags.name: _HOLD_GEAR_LONGER
strAdvancedFlags.description: Later upshifts; usually hits the gear's rev limit before shifting.

strAdvancedFlags.name: _STIFFER_SPRING_SPEED
strAdvancedFlags.description: Anti-downforce suspension; increases suspension spring force as vehicle goes faster.

strAdvancedFlags.name: _FAKE_WHEELSPIN
strAdvancedFlags.description: Generates fake wheelspin after an instance of real wheelspin; Tyres will stabilize and show 0.0m/s of slip with debugging data, but the traction behaves like it's still spinning.

strAdvancedFlags.name: _SMOOTH_REV_1ST
strAdvancedFlags.description: Smooth first-gear revving; resistance to hitting the rev-limit.

strAdvancedFlags.name: _IGNORE_TUNED_WHEELS_CLIP
strAdvancedFlags.description: Forced stock-tyre clipping boundaries, the sidewall gain/loss from a custom tyre will not matter. Refer to strHandlingFlags 00020000 above.

strAdvancedFlags.name: _DOWNFORCE_KERBFIX
strAdvancedFlags.description: Changes the way Downforce and spoiler tuning works, uses the setup found on Open-Wheel class vehicles in the vanilla game. Each spoiler/bumper tuning has to be given some statistics. Adjusts initial downforce from fDownforceModifier. 'Curb - boosting' seems to be nullified.

strAdvancedFlags.name: _DECREASE_BODYROLL_TUNING
strAdvancedFlags.description: Reduces body-roll if suspension upgrades are equipped.
